short_summary: Demande de renseignements sur une solution d'entreposage centralisée
description: The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) is seeking industry feedback regarding a centralized storage solution in support of all Vessel Modernization Program (VMP) Projects.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Title:** F7049-220141 - Loi - Centralized Storage Solution for Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)

### Summary

The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) is seeking industry feedback regarding a centralized storage solution in support of all Vessel Modernization Program (VMP) Projects.
